verses.roman:
saba bhakta lañā prabhu nāmilena jale
sabā lañā jala-krīḍā karena kutūhale

synonyms: saba bhakta—all the devotees; lañā—taking; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; nāmilena jale—got down in the water; sabā lañā—taking all of them; jala-krīḍā—activities in the water; karena—performs; kutūhale—in great jubilation.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu entered the water with His devotees and began His pastimes with them in great jubilation.
